desc: Nowadays, cash discounting is increasingly becoming the preferred method of payment acceptance among small businesses, allowing thousands of them to save significant amounts of money on their monthly processing fees.
heading: Pay 0% for your processing rates
banner: Fees are passed onto the customer
Compliant with laws and regulations in all 50 states
Receive a Free Credit Card terminal at no cos
pay_zero_fee_heading: Pay ZERO CC fees at the end of the month
pay_zero_fee_desc: Our cash discount program allows merchants to collect up to 100% of their revenue without all of the extra fees that come with accepting credit cards. The fees for processing the cards come directly to us and we pay all your monthly transactions. When you receive your merchant statement each month, you will always pay ZERO. A solution that completely eliminates merchant service fees and reduces your credit card fees 100%.
save_money_desc: When a customer checks out, the receipt will showcase the cash discount and the percentage. Your business is able to accept the full value of the product or service—free of credit card fees—while the customer is happy to receive a discount. They will still have the option to pay with a credit/debit card, just simply without the discount.
save_money_items: Compliant with law and regulations in all 50 states
Receive a Free credit card terminal
additional_items: Equipment comes pre-installed with software to easily implement the cash discount program and offers back-office reporting tools
all_business_heading: Cash Discount Pricing for all types of business
footer_heading: Ready to implement a Cash Discount Program for your business?
faq_sub_heading: With Extrabread’s Cash Discount Program, your business will pay 0% for your processing rates while offering your customers a discount they’ll be happy to cash in.
